source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gaze of the Infinite Infantry

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Shield Wall for 4.0 sec and gain Luck of the Draw!, which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Grasps of the Infinite Infantry

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.7 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,271 Haste for 12 sec.

Use: Gain 4 stacks of Platinum Plating for 30 sec, increasing your Armor by 10,953. Receiving more than 10% of your health from a Physical damage effect will remove one stack of Platinum Plating. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Shroud of the Sire's Chosen

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.

spells.description: Use: Teleports the caster to the Argent Tournament Grounds. (30 Min Cooldown)
